thread.title: Donald Trump to Host 'SNL' on November 7
thread.title_full: Donald Trump to Host 'SNL' on November 7

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Donald Trump to Host 'SNL' on November 7
text:
Comments The Republican presidential candidate will make his second appearance as a host on the NBC sketch show next month. 
Donald Trump is returning to " Saturday Night Live ". The 69-year-old Republican presidential candidate is announced to serve as a host on the NBC sketch show next month on November 7. He previously hosted "SNL" in an April 3, 2004 episode. Serving as a musical guest on "SNL" during Trump's hosting gig is Sia Furler who is set to perform songs from her next studio installment " This Is Acting ". It will also mark her second appearance on the variety show. She first performed on "SNL" in January this year. In the meantime, SNL will welcome its alum, Tracy Morgan , who is making a comeback after a hiatus following a fatal car accident. He will serve as an emcee on October 17 with Demi Lovato as a musical guest.
